Logback-Audit News

You can receive logback-audit-related announcements by subscribing to the QOS.ch announce mailing list.

February 13th, 2013 - Release of logback-audit version 0.6

Logback-core library upgraded to version 1.0.9.

SLF4J-API upgraded to version 1.7.2.

Janino library upgraded to version 2.6.1.

October 24th, 2011 - Release of logback-audit version 0.5

Initial public release of logback-audit.

May 15th, 2008 - Updates to logback-audit web-site

The logback-audit web-site has been updates with significantly enhanced contents.

March 28th, 2008 - Logback-Audit web-site goes live

The logback-audit web-site goes live. At its present state, it is pretty primitive but updates will follow.
